message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $90.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $80 for the product.

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer it to you for $85. It's a great price, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Thanks for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I still believe I can secure the product for less. I'm willing to pay $82 for it.

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $82. I'll offer you a slight discount, but I think it's still a great value. I'll sell it to you for $87. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the product.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.
Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go as high as $85, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'll offer it to you for $88. It's a great price, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm still seeking a more favorable price. I'm willing to pay $86 for the product.
Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go as high as $86, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $89. It's a fair price, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Thank you for your offers, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I'm willing to pay $87 for the product.
